DOC.brief_summary: In this study the investigators will recruit patients with the diagnosis of schizophrenia that are taking atypical neuroleptics and that are willing to participate in an exercise and diet program. The investigators will measure weight and abdomen circumference.
DOC.brief_title: Exercise and Diet Program for Schizophrenia Patients Who Are Taking Atypical Antipsychotic Medications
DOC.criteria: Schizophrenia Atypical neuroleptics Medical illness preventing exercise
